name: Warka Flarka Flim Flam
summary: Warka Flarka Flim Flam has you juggling with flat circles. You start with two paddles with which you bat one circle from one hand to the other, and then further balls, effects and influences are added to make juggling more difficult. Every mistake you make will be punished, starting you over again and again on your Journey to become the #1 Warka of Flarkas!
